original_text: But when Hiram went from Tyre to see the towns that Solomon had given him, he was not pleased with them.
korean_text: 히람이 두로에서 와서 솔로몬이 자기에게 준 성읍들을 보고 눈에 들지 아니하여

sentences.original_text: But when Hiram went from Tyre
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 히람이 두로에서 떠나 갈 때

sentences.original_text: he was not pleased with them
